work.title: Progress 4GL Developer
details: Developing scalable and reliable maintenance programs with CRUD functionalities.
Responsible to understand and analyze the issues reported by clients.
Responsible for handling technical queries of customers.
Providing Support on QAD EE, QAD MFGPRO and QAD WebUI.
Designing and developing needed QRF reports.
Program deployment and other server related work in Linux and Unix servers.
